column4: *does the zulu dance*  It worked!  wOOhOO!  Thanks.   I know that's a newbie fix and nothing I should celebrate but it helps alot.
One last question.  Is there an easy way to get VLC installed on Ubuntu with all the necessary codecs since ubuntu doesn't support jack squat on the a/v sice of things?
or even just codecs that work with the built in programs
there's an add/remove programs option for restricted formats
